title: Kibbeh
description: A traditional Syrian dish made with a mixture of fine bulgur, minced meat, and spices, shaped into ovals and stuffed before frying.
instructions: Soak fine bulgur in warm water for 20 minutes, then drain well.
Mix the bulgur with half of the minced meat, onion, salt, pepper, cumin, and cinnamon. Blend or knead until a smooth dough forms.
Prepare stuffing: saut√© the remaining minced meat with onions, spices, and optional pine nuts.
Shape kibbeh into oval shells and fill them with the cooked meat mixture.
Fry in hot oil until golden brown and crispy.
